sources.title: Peeping Penguins (1937)
sources.description: Curious penguins investigate an abandoned cabin, heedless of their mother's warning that "curiosity killed the cat." Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/peeping-penguins-1937/

metadata.Plot: Four boy-penguins are curious about an abandoned cabin. Their mother warns them in song that "curiosity killed the cat." They ignore her, partly because she hypocritically displays her own curiosity over a stovepipe they've knocked to the ground. But inside the cabin, they find themselves in danger from fire, gunfire and signal flares.
metadata.Actors: Mae Questel, Dorothy Compton, Beatrice Hagen
